entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except northeast 70 gusting to 90 through mainland inlets and valleys. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
